sentences.en: About myPhotoEdit The image editor for all and sundry.
sentences.cn: 对于所有的图像编辑器和杂项.

sentences.en: Can we lump all these items together under the heading'sundry expenses "?
sentences.cn: 我们能否把这些项目一并列入“杂费 ” 项下?

sentences.en: Cold drinks were served to all and sundry.
Hardware, pay electricity, daily sundry goods, building materials sales.
sentences.cn: 五金, 交电, 日用杂品, 建筑材料销售.

sentences.en: He invited all and sundry to celebrate his 20 th birthday.
sentences.cn: 他邀请所有的人都去庆祝他的20岁生日.

sentences.en: He makes films about animals, plants and sundry other subjects.
sentences.cn: 他拍摄动物、植物，还有其他各种题材的影片。

sentences.en: He was well known to all and sundry.
I don't want all and sundry knowing about our problems
sentences.cn: 我不想人人都知道我们的问题。

sentences.en: I don't want all and sundry knowing about our problems.
sentences.cn: 我不想知道关于我们问题的一切信息.

sentences.en: I made tea for all and sundry at the office.
sentences.cn: 我给办公室的每个人冲了一杯茶。

sentences.en: Scientists, business people, and sundry others gathered on Monday for the official opening.
sentences.cn: 星期一的正式开幕式上，科学家、商界人士和其他各色人等齐聚一堂。

sentences.en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentences.cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

sentences.en: She invited all and sundry to her party.
sentences.cn: 她邀请所有的人都来参加聚会.

sentences.en: She invited all and sundry to her party.
sentences.cn: 她邀请所有的人都来参加聚会.

sentences.en: The synchronization or asynchronism transmission may be selected with sundry modes.
sentences.cn: 数据传输包括同步传输和异步传输.

sentences.en: This cream can be used to treat sundry minor injuries.
sentences.cn: 这种药膏可用来治各种轻伤.

sentences.en: We can see the rich man on sundry occasions.
sentences.cn: 我们能在各种场合见到那个富豪.

sentences.en: We defray this charge when you pay your sundry fees bill.
sentences.cn: 在您付杂费的同时我们要支付这笔费用.

trans.tran_en: not similar enough to form a group
